channel.title: Mike Mullen on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Mike Mullen on The Huddle

item.title: Prepare Your Team For The Hard Decisions
item.description: It is a big point midway through a big game at the most important high school elite open tourney of the year. The opposing team has taken a timeout between points. You look at the team you coach to figure out what line you want in the game. You know that a number of your kids haven’t been in the game yet and that they paid a lot of money to make the plane trip.
